val:
Watching the snow melt off the flatirons while wearing shorts and a tee shirt for the first time in six months is a sure sign that it's spring time in the Rockies and that only means one thing... bikes.

I've loved mountain biking for as long as I can remember but I've never pursued it in my photography. The majority of this shoot is smply spec work, meaning on speculation, in other words this work isn't for any particular brand but rather just a collection of photos to pitch to brands as an example of my work.

These photos were also made in part to get some content for my friends at keepitfvn, a company ran by the model for all these photos Jason Lorenz.
